text: Hessi he paacezi inte bolla gakizay inte ammanozi tumu gididayssa qonccisanaskko. Dhayana worqayka taman paacettes. Worqape aadhi boncho gidida inte ammanoyka hessaththo paacistanas besses. Hessi he paacetida inte ammanoy Yesus Kiristoosay qoncciza gallas galatas, bonchosine sabas intena gaathana.
